description: This quest catagory is a side addition to the main quest line.
In this quest catagory, you can go through the involved processes for making the best tools possible with Tetra.
Most quests in this catagory are /b/hidden/b/. Its up to you to discover them, but /6/clues may be given/6/.
Tetra's built-in /6/advancements/6/ may also hint at where or how you could do things. It's worth taking a look.
Other times, quests are just hidden because you need to progress the main questline further.
